Name: Greenpoint
Ingredients: 50 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Stirred and boozy with rye whiskey punch and spice smoothed by herbal Yellow Chartreuse and sweet vermouth.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2006 by Michael McIlroy at Milk & Honey in New York City, USA. Michael's original recipe calls for a lemon zest twist, but we prefer an orange zest twist.
Nutrition: One serving of Greenpoint contains 187 calories
